persona: A safety inspector responsible for ensuring compliance with nuclear safety standards
instructions: Remove the "New Calendar Name" from the list of calendars
Add a new event on May 12th titled "Safety Inspection Meeting" from 9 AM to 11 AM
Change the color of the "Tasks" calendar for better visibility
Delete the "Birthdays" calendar from the list
Update the time zone to reflect the correct local time for our inspections
